com.javagameengine.assets.mesh

Class AttributeBuffer<T extends java.nio.Buffer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagameengine.assets.NativeObject
      • com.javagameengine.assets.mesh.AttributeBuffer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Java NIO buffer type this class serves as a wrapper for

    public class AttributeBuffer<T extends java.nio.Buffer>
extends NativeObject
    AttributeBuffer is a wrapper class for Java NIO buffers which extends NativeObject. It is meant to provide easy access to buffers stored on the graphics card. It also provides values to set the stride, offset, and usage of the data.
